``` ::: ::: ## Abstract > {epoxy} is a new R package that allows report authors to seamless blend prose > and data in markdown, HTML, and LaTeX reports. {epoxy} builds on the excellent > tools for data-driven reporting provided by R Markdown, Quarto and Shiny, > while saving report authors from tedious and repetitive data formatting tasks. > This talk will highlight the many ways that {epoxy} can help data scientists > in medicine to streamline reports, articles, and Shiny apps.
